bill.title: Pseudoephedrine; Tracking
bill.description: Establishes an electronic tracking system for the sale of products containing pseudoephedrine. Limits the amount of pseudoephedrine products that may be sold or distributed to a person without a prescription to products containing not more than 3.6 grams of pseudoephedrine per day or not more than nine grams of pseudoephedrine per thirty-day period. Requires the pharmacy or retailer to maintain a written or electronic log of nonprescription products containing pseudoephedrine sold. (SB2228 HD2)

(S) The committee(s) on HTH has scheduled a public hearing on 02-13-12 1:15PM in conference room 229.
